title: 23 Cat Memes That Are Not Allowed to be This Fluffing Funny, That's Illegal, Call the Cat Pawlice
description: Wee-ooo-wee-ooo the Cat Pawlice siren is loud and clear. They came all the way to our office to arrest us. The charges: We uploaded such fluffing funny feline memes in a fuzzy frenzy, and these memes were not allowed to be this funny. It was an illegal act of hooman hubris, thinking we could bring such cat comedy to the masses. These memes were so funny that laughing at them could never be stopped. So the only choice the Cat Pawlice had was to stop us - and arrest us. We're not sure who called the Cat Pawlice and ratted us out, but they're here. This is goodbye.Since we're going to end up in cat jail, we leave you with these memes. We know that these cat memes are not allowed to be this funny, but wow, they're so fluffing funny. They are yours to keep now. We will reunite with them when we finish our time at the cat jail.
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: 23 Cat Memes That Are Not Allowed to be This Fluffing Funny, That's Illegal, Call the Cat Pawlice - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

Wee-ooo-wee-ooo the Cat Pawlice siren is loud and clear. They came all the way to our office to arrest us. The charges: We uploaded such fluffing funny feline memes in a fuzzy frenzy, and these memes were not allowed to be this funny. It was an illegal act of hooman hubris, thinking we could bring such cat comedy to the masses. These memes were so funny that laughing at them could never be stopped. So the only choice the Cat Pawlice had was to stop us - and arrest us. We're not sure who called the Cat Pawlice and ratted us out, but they're here. This is goodbye.

Since we're going to end up in cat jail, we leave you with these memes. We know that these cat memes are not allowed to be this funny, but wow, they're so fluffing funny. They are yours to keep now. We will reunite with them when we finish our time at the cat jail.
